description: Allows the player to spawn pawns who will attack other players.

attackKnockback.description: Specifies the attack knockback of the pawns.

followRange.description: Specifies the follow range of the pawns.

count.description: Specifies the number of pawns to spawn.

customName.description: Specifies the custom name of the entity.

movementSpeed.description: Specifies the movement speed of the pawns.

duration.description: Specifies the duration of the lives of the pawns in ticks (1 second = 20 ticks). If 0, the lives of the pawns will not be limited.

armorToughness.description: Specifies the armor toughness of the pawns.

armor.description: Specifies the armor of the pawns.

cooldown.description: Specifies the cooldown of the ability.

name.description: Specifies the name of the ability.

maxHealth.description: Specifies the health of the pawns.

adult.description: Specifies whether the entity should be an adult.

entity.description: Specifies the type of the entity.

knockbackResistance.description: Specifies the knockback resistance of the pawns.

attackDamage.description: Specifies the attack damage of the pawns.
